name: VAIO Video File
summary: Learn about .VMLT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VMLT files often appear after a computer crash or a failed installation of a Windows service pack. When the correct codec is unavailable to play the PMB or WMM video project files, they are converted into a folder that contains a VMLT and .VMLF file. If this occurs, open the VMLT file with the GSpot utility, which tells you about the file and whether the codecs are installed.
NOTE: VMLT files are the same as VMLF files.

description: Video format used by the Picture Motion Browser (PMB) or Windows Movie Maker (WMM) utilities on Sony VAIO computers; stores video data converted from other video formats, such as .AVI and MPEG.
